PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02142011-02-10NRCAN,  NEB,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Orders EC-III-4, EC-III-10 and EC-III-12 (Variance of National Energy Board Certificates)
PrecisOrder amending the Certificates of Public Convenience and Necessity Nos. EC-III-4, EC-III-10 and EC-III-12 to approve the variance of the holder of the Certificates from British Columbia Transmission Corporation (BCTC) and British Columbia Hydro and Power Authority (BC Hydro), to BC Hydro only.
AttachmentsAttachment
